org.apache.flink.runtime.util

类 LeaderRetrievalUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.util.LeaderRetrievalUtils

  • public class LeaderRetrievalUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to work with LeaderRetrievalService class.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  LeaderRetrievalUtils.LeaderConnectionInfoListener
      Helper class which is used by the retrieveLeaderConnectionInfo method to retrieve the leader's akka URL and the current leader session ID.
      static class  LeaderRetrievalUtils.LeaderGatewayListener
      Helper class which is used by the retrieveLeaderGateway method as the LeaderRetrievalListener.

    • 方法详细资料

      • retrieveLeaderGateway

        public static ActorGateway retrieveLeaderGateway(LeaderRetrievalService leaderRetrievalService,
                                                 akka.actor.ActorSystem actorSystem,
                                                 scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout)
                                          throws LeaderRetrievalException
        Retrieves the current leader gateway using the given LeaderRetrievalService. If the current leader could not be retrieved after the given timeout, then a LeaderRetrievalException is thrown.
        参数:
        leaderRetrievalService - LeaderRetrievalService which is used for the leader retrieval
        actorSystem - ActorSystem which is used for the LeaderRetrievalListener implementation
        timeout - Timeout value for the retrieval call
        返回:
        The current leader gateway
        抛出:
        LeaderRetrievalException - If the actor gateway could not be retrieved or the timeout has been exceeded

      • retrieveLeaderConnectionInfo

        public static LeaderConnectionInfo retrieveLeaderConnectionInfo(LeaderRetrievalService leaderRetrievalService,
                                                                scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout)
                                                         throws LeaderRetrievalException
        Retrieves the leader akka url and the current leader session ID. The values are stored in a LeaderConnectionInfo instance.
        参数:
        leaderRetrievalService - Leader retrieval service to retrieve the leader connection information
        timeout - Timeout when to give up looking for the leader
        返回:
        LeaderConnectionInfo containing the leader's akka URL and the current leader session ID
        抛出:
        LeaderRetrievalException

      • retrieveLeaderSessionId

        public static java.util.UUID retrieveLeaderSessionId(LeaderRetrievalService leaderRetrievalService,
                                                     scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout)
                                              throws LeaderRetrievalException
        Retrieves the current leader session id of the component identified by the given leader retrieval service.
        参数:
        leaderRetrievalService - Leader retrieval service to be used for the leader retrieval
        timeout - Timeout for the leader retrieval
        返回:
        The leader session id of the retrieved leader
        抛出:
        LeaderRetrievalException - if the leader retrieval operation fails (including a timeout)

      • findConnectingAddress

        public static java.net.InetAddress findConnectingAddress(LeaderRetrievalService leaderRetrievalService,
                                                         Time timeout)
                                                  throws LeaderRetrievalException
        抛出:
        LeaderRetrievalException

                                                         scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout)
                                                  throws LeaderRetrievalException
        抛出:

      • getRecoveryMode

        public static HighAvailabilityMode getRecoveryMode(Configuration config)
        Gets the recovery mode as configured, based on the ConfigConstants.HA_MODE config key.
        参数:
        config - The configuration to read the recovery mode from.
        返回:
        The recovery mode.
        抛出:
        IllegalConfigurationException - Thrown, if the recovery mode does not correspond to a known value.
